_header: Lord Christ Thou havest us bought
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: Prayer to Christ — four 5-line stanzas in English, alternating with four stanzas in Old French

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Louerd crist þou hauest us boustÞou madest al þis
                    world of noust…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Ihesu þi blisse us bi see for þiswete moder
                    loue
